sentence: The former president has endorsed Wyoming lawyer Harriet Hageman, a former gubernatorial candidate who is primary challenging Cheney in the state's August GOP primary.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Republican National Committee overwhelming votes to censure Cheney, Kinzinger for sitting on Jan. 6 committee

sentence: Continue reading WEGMAN EARNS NOD - House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy is endorsing Harriet Hageman in her Wyoming primary challenge to Rep. Liz Cheney, a rare move by a sitting party leader to back an attempt to unseat one of his members.
author: Jack Durschlag
title: California's 'endemic' approach
